ceterms:estimatedDuration.ceterms:description: Most work-at-your-own-pace applicants earn this credential within 3-9 months.
Members of our special club can earn this credential via a special six month course.

ceterms:jurisdiction.ceterms:description: This credential can be used anywhere on earth.

ceterms:occupationType.ceterms:targetNodeDescription: Build rough wooden structures, such as concrete forms, scaffolds, tunnel, bridge, or sewer supports, billboard signs, and temporary frame shelters, according to sketches, blueprints, or oral instructions.
Lay and install carpet from rolls or blocks on floors. Install padding and trim flooring materials.
Assemble, install, repair, or maintain electric or hydraulic freight or passenger elevators, escalators, or dumbwaiters.
